Banner.Description: full-stack developer with 1 year of experience in web developer. A fast and efficient learner with deep understanding and a passion for software development. Currently seeking a role as a full-stack dev at a professional company.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hello! My name is Muhammad and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2014 when I decided to edit a blogger template for my blog so I learn a little about html and css
Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had an internship at GlobaDev where I learned about Agile methodology and how to write a clean code and building many websites and projects to practice our knowledge
Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Used agile methodology and learned how to manage projects through it.
Developed a social dating app using angular and asp.net core.
Used Postman Rest client for chrome to test all the services.
Comfortable with source control tools such as git and GitHub
Implemented Test Driven Deployment (TDD) to perform  the unit tests.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Front-end developer
Description: Developed a landing page with Bootstrap.
Deployed a government website with heroku and added ssl certificate by cloudflare.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Front-end developer
Description:
Internship By Gaza Sky Geeks about React js includes:
React js fundamental, Advanced Guides, Ant.Design, Maps Integration, Redux
Developed a restaurant website using React js and google maps api for map integration

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Dating app
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A social App to find soulmates that performs various functions like signing Up, logout, messaging, searching, uploading photos and much more developed using angular,Entity Framework, and asp.net core.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Recipes Book
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A cookbook App that performs various functions like sign Up, logout, add to the shopping list as well as Addition, remove, and update the Recipes developed using angular and firebase.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: movies app
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A movies App that performs various functions like sign Up, login,searching and fetch movies from the server developed using angular.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Pato Place Restaurant
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A website developed using React js and bootstrap in which a customer can browse the menu, Reservation table or following the restaurant and read its' news.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: simple store
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: website developed using react js and Redux preform various functions like get post form the server and add to cart.
